title: Mick Mountz, Founder Of Kiva Systems
teaser: Host Jessica Harris speaks with Mick Mountz, founder of Kiva Systems, a robotics company that automates warehouse fulfillment. She also speaks with Jessamyn Rodriguez, founder of Hot Bread Kitchen.
contentencoded:
Host Jessica Harris speaks with Mick Mountz, founder of Kiva Systems, a robotics company that automates warehouse fulfillment.

She also speaks with Jessamyn Rodriguez, founder of Hot Bread Kitchen.

Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
